```{r}
devtools::install_github("zachcp/nycmaps")
library(nycmaps)
library(maps)
map(database="nyc")
nyc <- map_data("nyc")



ggplot(df, aes(x = Longitude, y = Latitude)) +
  geom_point(aes(), alpha=.7) + 
  scale_colour_gradient(low = "grey", high = "green") + 
  ggtitle("Call ins by location") +
  geom_map(
           data=nyc, 
           map=nyc,
           aes(x=long, y=lat, map_id=region))

```


```{r}

mapnyc <- data.frame(latitude = c(40.7032815,40.7082398),
                     longitude = c(-74.0192166, -74.0054436),
                     logprice = c(120,56))
min_lat <- 40.5774
max_lat <- 40.9176
min_long <- -74.15
max_long <- -73.7004

library(ggmap)
library(ggthemes)

plot <- ggplot(mapnyc, aes(x=df$Longitude, y=df$Latitude,color =logprice),alpha =0.03) +
            geom_point(size=0.8) +
            scale_x_continuous(limits=c(min_long, max_long)) +
            scale_y_continuous(limits=c(min_lat, max_lat)) 
plot 


```
